name: INPlayMediaIntentResponseCode
desc: Codes returned by an app or Intents app extension when handling or confirming a play media intent.

items.name: case ready
items.desc: The intents handler is ready to handle the intent.

items.name: case continueInApp
items.desc: The system should launch the app in the foreground to play the media.

items.name: case handleInApp
items.desc: The system should launch the app in the background to play the media.

items.name: case inProgress
items.desc: The app is preparing to play the media content.

items.name: case success
items.desc: The app is playing the media.

items.name: case failure
items.desc: A failure occurred while confirming or handling the intent.

items.name: case failureNoUnplayedContent
items.desc: The media container has no unplayed content.

items.name: case failureRequiringAppLaunch
items.desc: The user must launch the app before media playback can begin.

items.name: case failureRestrictedContent
items.desc: The app cannot play the media because of content restrictions.

items.name: case failureUnknownMediaType
items.desc: The app cannot play the media because the type is unknown or not supported.
